message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1000000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $950000. This is a fantastic chance to secure such a valuable asset at a discount, and I am confident it will be a wise investment for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
